chapter.title: Tracing
chapter.para: Yap can send diagnostic messages to the windows debug window. This may be helpful if you want to troubleshoot problems.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para:
Trace output is directed to the debug output window. A freeware implementation named
DebugView getting
DebugView can be downloaded from .

chapter.section:
Enabling Tracing
tracing turning on
Tracing is off by default. To enable tracing, click
tracing enabling
Tracing on the View menu. This command turns on standard trace flags suitable for debugging Yap related problems.
tracing setting trace flags
If you want more control, you can use the command-line switch --trace=traceflags. You can set the following trace flags (separated by comma):
&tracestreams;
